DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective randomized multicenter study which purpose is to determine whether triclosan-coated sutures for wound closure after lower limb vascular surgery would reduce the incidence of surgical wound infections.
DOC.brief_title: Triclosan Coated Suture Wound Closure for Peripheral Vascular Surgery: a Prospective Multicenter Study
DOC.criteria: patient undergoing peripheral vascular surgery procedure patients refusal
